sentences.en: All cheques should be made out to "EF International Language Schools"
sentences.cn: 所有支票的收款人都应是“英孚国际语言学校”。

sentences.en: By his international achievements he leaves a fitting monument to his beliefs.
sentences.cn: 他在国际上的成就为其信念作出了最好的注解。

sentences.en: Globalisation is a catch-all to describe increased international trade.
sentences.cn: “全球化”是个泛称，用以描述增进了的国际贸易。

sentences.en: He grandly declared that "international politics is a struggle for power".
sentences.cn: 他一本正经地宣称“国际政治是一场权力之争”。

sentences.en: He is Rupert Murdoch's right-hand man at News International.
sentences.cn: 他是鲁珀特·默多克在国际新闻公司的得力助手。

sentences.en: He is the founder of International Sports Management Limited.
sentences.cn: 他是国际体育管理有限公司的创始人。

sentences.en: I was alarmed by his naivety and ignorance of international affairs.
sentences.cn: 他对国际事务缺乏经验且无知，这很让我吃惊。

sentences.en: International investors have become jittery about the country's economy.
sentences.cn: 国际投资者已对该国的经济状况感到紧张不安。

sentences.en: It's been a tumultuous day at the international trade negotiations in Brussels.
sentences.cn: 那是布鲁塞尔国际贸易谈判中纷乱的一天。

sentences.en: On reaching Dubai the evacuees are taken straight to Dubai international airport.
sentences.cn: 撤离人员一抵达迪拜就径直被送往迪拜国际机场。

sentences.en: The airline plans to auction its international routes to former competitors.
sentences.cn: 这家航空公司打算把他们的国际线路拍卖给以前的竞争对手。

sentences.en: The judge called the decision "a flagrant violation of international law"
sentences.cn: 法官称这一决定是“对国际法的公然违背”。

sentences.en: the response of the international community
the UN and other international organizations
sentences.cn: 联合国和其他国际组织

sentences.en: This case was bound to get entangled in international politics.
sentences.cn: 这件事肯定会在国际政坛上纠缠不清。

sentences.en: Voters perceive him as a decisive and resolute international leader.
sentences.cn: 投票者认为他是一位坚定果断的国际领导人。

sentences.en: Welsh international Matthew Postle was third fastest at the halfway point.
sentences.cn: 到半程时，威尔士的世界级选手马修·波斯特尔位居第三。

words.tran_cn: 国际主义者；国际法学家
使国际化；置于国际管理下

phrases.tran_cn: 国际惯例；国际公约；国际协定

trans.tran_en: relating to or involving more than one nation

trans.tran_cn: 国际比赛，国际比赛选手，外国人
